instructions: Turn on your Amazon Fire TV and click on Settings in the top menu bar. Navigate to and click on Preferences . Fire Tv Parental Controls 1 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Click on Parental Controls and set to On. Fire Tv Parental Controls 2 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Your Fire TV will ask you to enter your PIN . This should be the same as your PIN across all of your Amazon devices. If you've forgotten yours (I forgot mine), simply go to amazon.com/pin to reset it. Fire Tv Paremtal Controls 3 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Once you've enabled Parental Controls , you can get more granular with it, and turn on/off PIN requirements for purchases, viewing restrictions, app launches and downloads, and the Amazon Photos app. Fire Tv Parental Controls 4 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central
